name: The UnderBeasts Challenge
description:
Being stuck inside during the COVID pandemic I decided to make this little game to help people stay active.

Once you hit start you are presented with a exercise to perform for time. The time will depend on the difficulty setting you select

Easy = 30 seconds

Medium = 45 seconds

Hard = 60 seconds

when the timer hits 0 you will be presented with another random exercise until you hit the "Tap Out" button. You will then be presented with a score screen showing you how many exercises you performed and how low you were exercising for.

This was made for @UnderBeasts health and fitness brand check out their online training and other services via www.underbeasts.com
